db:abstract.db:para: Represents a rectangular area on an output device.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type encapsulates a rectangular area of pixels that is displayed on an output device. It corresponds to the interface wl_surface in the Wayland protocol.

db:section.db:title: bufferScale : size
db:section.db:para: This property holds the WaylandSurface's buffer scale. The buffer scale lets a client supply higher resolution buffer data for use on high resolution outputs.

db:section.db:title: client : object
db:section.db:para: This property holds the client using this WaylandSurface.

db:section.db:title: clientRenderingEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property specifies whether client rendering is enabled for the surface.

db:section.db:title: contentOrientation : enum
db:section.db:para: This property holds the orientation of the WaylandSurface's contents.

db:section.db:title: cursorSurface : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the WaylandSurface is a cursor surface.

db:section.db:title: hasContent : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the WaylandSurface has content.

db:section.db:title: origin : enum
db:section.db:para: This property holds the origin of the WaylandSurface's buffer, or WaylandSurface.OriginTopLeft if the surface has no buffer.
It can have the following values:

db:listitem.db:para: WaylandSurface.OriginTopLeft The origin is the top left corner of the buffer.
WaylandSurface.OriginBottomLeft The origin is the bottom left corner of the buffer.

db:section.db:title: size : size
db:section.db:para: This property holds the WaylandSurface's size in pixels.

db:section.db:title: useTextureAlpha : bool
db:section.db:para: This property specifies whether the surface should use texture alpha.

db:section.db:title: void dragStarted(object drag)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when a drag has started from this surface.

db:section.db:title: void initialize(object compositor, object client, int id, int version)
db:section.db:para: Initializes the WaylandSurface with the given compositor and client, and with the given id and version.

db:section.db:title: bool isDestroyed()
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the WaylandSurface has been destroyed. Otherwise returns false.
